message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a premium price of $150. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product, which I think is fair considering its value. Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. I'm willing to negotiate and can lower the price to $130. I believe this still reflects the true value of the product.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $130 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I'm only able to pay $110 at this time.  Would you be willing to consider that?
